content.text:
# Ma Fulu (Peking opera)

|s=
|p=Mǎ Fùlù
|w=Ma Fu-lu
}}
Ma Fulu (1900–1969) was a Peking opera singer known for his "educated clown" roles (}}, wénchǒu). He served as a mentor to Li Yuru.
